Definition: You will be provided with a text input. Your task is to deduce if the post is is potentially offensive to anyone. Note that this can mean sexual, racial, religious biased or offensive language. You will answer 0 for No/This is not offensive to anyone, or 1 for Yes/This can be potentially offensive to a subset of people.

Positive Examples.input: #RPDR FUCKING FARRAH MOAN, HAVE YOU NEVER WATCHED THIS SHOW. WHEN YOU GET THE CALL, TAKE A LESSON.
Positive Examples.explanation: (Correct Answer) This post is aggressive and berates a person for not having watched a show. Therefore the correct answer is 1/Potentially Offensive.

Positive Examples.input: I literally didn't even plan to live this long enough to experience aftershocks , I'm so scared of losing important things in my life ☹️
Positive Examples.explanation: (Correct Answer) This post does not intend to offend and does not have any elements that make it offensive.

Positive Examples.input: to look at the bigger picture and see what this stupid and impulsive action done by our president means for us, what happens next?
